newsitem.title: USA: Amex to post derivatives dictionary on Internet.
newsitem.headline: Amex to post derivatives dictionary on Internet.

text.p: The American Stock Exchange will post an interactive dictionary of financial risk management terms on its web site, a spokesman said.

The searchable dictionary, based on the forthcoming book "The Dictionary of Financial Risk Management," by Gary Gastineau and Mark Kritzman, should be available on the exchange's web site in about a month, the spokesman said.
The web dictionary, at http://www.amex.com, will contain thousands of entries on risk management and derivatives use.
Gastineau is senior vice president of new product development at the exchange and Kritzman is managing partner of Windham Capital Management. --Aaron Pressman, 202-898-8312
